meta.purpose: Reusable tweet templates for consistent messaging

agent_spotlight.example:
Agent Spotlight: Neural Oracle

Real-time market analysis
Pattern recognition
Risk scoring
Automated alerts

Your 24/7 market intelligence.

variables.CALL_TO_ACTION: What you want readers to do

educational_thread.example:
Thread: How HypeAI's 15 agents work together

1/ Think of it like a specialized team:
- Analysts gather data
- Strategists plan moves
- Executors act
- Validators ensure quality

All coordinated on-chain.

community_engagement.example:
If you could design the 16th agent, what would it do?

Best answer gets featured in our docs.

Go:

technical_deep_dive.example:
Tech Stack Breakdown:

Blockchain: Solana
Smart Contracts: Rust
AI Models: Custom-trained
Oracle: Decentralized
Governance: On-chain

Built for speed, security, and scalability.

comparison_tweet.format:
[COMPETITOR_APPROACH]: [THEIR_CLAIM]

HypeAI: [OUR_REALITY]

We are not the same.
comparison_tweet.example:
Other projects: "We have 1 AI bot that tweets"

HypeAI: "We have 15 specialized AI agents running autonomous operations on-chain"

We are not the same.

poll_tweet.format:
Quick poll

[QUESTION]

A) [OPTION_A]
B) [OPTION_B]
C) [OPTION_C]
D) [OPTION_D]

Comment below!
poll_tweet.example:
Quick poll

Which agent are you most excited about?

A) Neural Oracle (market analysis)
B) Governance Guardian (DAO automation)
C) Risk Sentinel (security)
D) All 15 of them

Comment below!

meme_format.example:
POV: You found a crypto project that:

- Actually works
- Is fully documented
- Has no VCs
- Launches fairly
- Uses real AI

*checks if this is real life*

response_templates.positive_feedback: Thanks for the support! We're building this for the community, by the community. [SPECIFIC_RESPONSE]
response_templates.technical_question: Great question! [TECHNICAL_ANSWER] Check out our docs for more: [LINK]
response_templates.criticism_or_concern: We appreciate the feedback. [ACKNOWLEDGE_CONCERN] Here's how we're addressing it: [SOLUTION]
response_templates.comparison_question: HypeAI is different because: [KEY_DIFFERENTIATOR]. We focus on [CORE_VALUE].
response_templates.how_to_join:
Welcome! Here's how to get started:
1. [STEP_1]
2. [STEP_2]
3. [STEP_3]
See you in the community!
response_templates.partnership_inquiry: Thanks for your interest! We're focused on organic ecosystem growth. DM us with details about your project.
response_templates.media_inquiry: For media inquiries, please reach out to [CONTACT]. We're happy to discuss [TOPICS].
